text:
Please add a reference for the StartCom CA here, which issues basic client and server certificates for free and higher validated ones for reasonable fees.

Suggested entry:

StartCom CA
http://www.startssl.com/
creator: eddy_nigg@startcom.org
tony@pc-tony.com
text:
I think we have enough CA's listed.  I cannot see any reason to expand this list any further.  

Cheers,
Tony
